tasks.task: Farming practices in response to drought and crop insurance
subtasks: Continuing farming operations despite natural disasters
Understanding crop insurance limitations for farmers in developing countries
Describing traditional farming methods by Dick Thompson in Iowa
Mentioning the role of crop insurance in supporting farmers during crop failure
Highlighting adaptation strategies like diversified crops and livestock integration
Explaining the use of manure for soil fertilization and water retention
Discussing the impact of climate change on farming conditions
Recognizing the potential universal lessons from successful traditional farming practices
